ModMetaData.name: DLC Mechanics Patch
ModMetaData.author: Sierra
ModMetaData.description:
[h1]Mod Version: v1.0[/h1]
Tired of having to subscribe to a whole bunch of mods that does similar things to Royalty and Ideology mechanics? Rather have 1 mod that does it all?
This is a simple mod that patches various DLC mechanics. The files are easily customisable to anyone with rudimentary XML skills (or let's face it, reading skills).
[b]Features:[/b] [list] [*]Removes Royalty pawn work restrictions. [*]Removes Royalty pawn apparel requirements. [*]Removes Royalty pawn throne room requirements. [*]Removes Royalty pawn bedroom requirements. [*]Removes Royalty pawn food requirements. [*]Removes Ideology pawn clothing requirement. [*]Removes Ideology pawn work restrictions. [/list]
[b]Recommended Mods:[/b] [list] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2553700067]Medieval Overhaul[/url] - [i]De facto mod for Medieval games.[/i] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2646321064]Medieval Empire Overhaul[/url] - [i]Requires Medieval Overhaul. Changes Empire faction from Spacer to Medieval.[/i] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2836791007]RimFantasy - Medieval Overhaul Edition[/url] - [i]Core mod for RimFantasy. Adds various gem-based magical furniture and weapons. Requires Medieval Overhaul.[/i] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=0000000000]RimFantasy - House Doyle[/url] - [i]Official RimFantasy AddOn. Adds player craftable house armor plus a new line of Arcane Weapons.[/i]
[*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1916352291]RimTraits - Medieval Talent[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2206957172]RimTraits - General Traits[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2244594116]RimTraits - Vanilla Trait Colors[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2595980371]Milkshakes - Digital Deluxe Edition[/url] [/list]
[b]Compatibility:[/b] [list] [*]Obviously don't use it alongside mods that patch the same things. [/list]
